dcterms:description: The InLegalNER dataset is specifically designed to encompass a comprehensive range of entities pertinent to the legal domain, providing a robust benchmark for evaluating the capability of LLMs in recognizing and categorizing legal entities accurately.
dcterms:title: InLegalNER
